description: Was “Ye” rushed, and does it matter? How do women fit into Kanye’s world? Are conversations about politics with him fruitless? A conversation, on Popcast.
title: Kanye West: You Asked, We Answered
title_page: Kanye West: You Asked, We Answered - The New York Times
text:
The Popcast is hosted by Jon Caramanica, a pop music critic for The New York Times. It covers the latest in pop music criticism, trends and news.
This year’s Yeezy Season in music has finally come to a close — Kanye West released five albums in five weeks: his own “Ye”; his collaboration with Kid Cudi, “Kids See Ghosts”; and albums by Nas, Teyana Taylor and Pusha-T that he produced.
This moment was capped off by an exclusive interview with Mr. West by Mr. Caramanica, who spent two days interviewing Mr. West following his Wyoming listening session for “Ye.”
